summary: Comprehensive testing of Inventory and Procurement modules completed. All 30 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI verified working correctly after fixing a Pydantic validation bug.

fixed.issue: Pydantic validation error - supplier_code was required but some DB records had None
fixed.fix: Made supplier_code Optional in Supplier model

ui_bugs.issue: Select.Item with empty string value causing runtime error
ui_bugs.note: Error appears briefly but doesn't break functionality

action_items: Fix Select.Item empty string value in Inventory.js (line ~450-460) - change value='' to value='none' or remove the empty option
critical_code_review_comments: useEffect dependency warnings in Inventory.js and Procurement.js - consider adding eslint-disable comments or fixing dependencies
Some suppliers in DB have null supplier_code - data migration may be needed to ensure consistency
seed_data_creation: Test data created during pytest run: items, warehouses, suppliers, POs, GRNs
context_for_next_testing_agent: Inventory and Procurement modules fully tested. Backend APIs working 100%. Frontend has minor Select.Item warning but all functionality works. Full procurement flow (Supplier -> PO -> GRN -> Stock) verified working.

inventory.dashboard: PASS - Stats display correctly (Items, Warehouses, Low Stock, Transfers, Stock Value)
inventory.items_crud: PASS - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working
inventory.stock_balance: PASS - View stock levels across warehouses

procurement.dashboard: PASS - Stats display correctly (Suppliers, POs, Pending POs, GRNs, PO Value)
procurement.suppliers_crud: PASS - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working
procurement.purchase_orders: PASS - Create PO with line items, status management working
procurement.grn: PASS - Create GRN from PO, approve GRN to update stock
